author: julianfoad
msg: The book is now published and has a new name.  Update documentation files
accordingly.
Patch by: Chris Pepper <pepper@reppep.com>
(Tweaked by me.)
* HACKING:
s/Subversion: The Definitive Guide/Version Control with Subversion/
Update the description of the book, and give its direct web address instead
of how to find it on Subversion's web site (which has changed slightly).
* doc/book/README:
s/Subversion: The Definitive Guide/Version Control with Subversion/, etc.

author: ringstrom
msg: * STATUS: Add and vote for r11224.

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix issue 2070 - Exporting symlinks with use-commit times set fails
Patch by: Rafael Ackermann <mose@netvision.net.il>
* subversion/libsvn_client/export.c
(close_file) Added check for special files before calling
set_file_affected_time.

author: plasma
msg: Update Traditonal Chinese translation file in branch/1.1.x.
* subversion/po/zh_TW.po
* make locale-gnu-po-update.
* po-merge.py.
* Fix two fuzziness.

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #2071 (un-XML-safe author names causing failed MERGE),
and escape datestrings while I'm at it (just in case).
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/merge.c
(dav_svn__merge_response): XML-escape the author and date strings
before sending them across the wire.
